featured.text: The Shoe That Grows, created by a charity called Because International, changes all this.
Some people, however, are so grateful that they send extra money to Jack or to the charities his company supports.
They work from home and give all the money they earn to charity.

definition.zh_def: 慈善，指幫助有需要的人或社會的行為或組織。
definition.en_def: The voluntary giving of help, typically in the form of money, to those in need.
definition.example: She donated to the charity that supports homeless families.
